title: Tequila Sunrise (A Robert Towne Film)
description:
==========================================================================================================================================================================


Mac Mckussic is an unlikely drug dealer who wants to go straight. His old and best friend Nick Frescia is now a cop who is assigned to investigate and bring him to justice. Mac is very attracted to Jo Ann, the owner of a stylish restaurant.

Nick gets close to Jo Ann attempting to know more about Mac's drug dealing plans and his connections with the Mexican dealer Carlos, who the police believe is coming to town to meet with him. Nick also falls for Jo Ann's charms and his friendship with Mac is in danger.


==========================================================================================================================================================================


Directed By: Robert Towne

MPAA: Rated R For Strong Language, Drug Content And Some Violence.

Runtime: 1 Hour, 50 Minutes, 32 Seconds

Genre: Action / Crime / Romance / Thriller

Plot Keywords: Drugs / Restaurant / Police / Mexican / Drug Dealer

Country: USA

Language: English / Spanish

Subtitles: English (Closed Captions)

Color: Color

Resolution: 720 x 416

Format: Original Widescreen Presentation ( Aspect Ratio: 1.85:1 )

Sound Mix: Dolby Digital 2.0 ( AC3, 192 Kbps )

System: PAL

XviD Codec Version: 1.2.1
